universum.studios.android.ui.widget

Class CubicPageTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.ui.widget.CubicPageTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewPager.PageTransformer

    public class CubicPageTransformer
extends Object
implements ViewPager.PageTransformer
    A ViewPager.PageTransformer implementation that can be used to transform pages like in 3D cube space horizontally.

    Whether to transform pages with camera positioned outside or inside the 3D cube can be specified via CubicPageTransformer(CameraPosition) constructor.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CubicPageTransformer.CameraPosition
      Represents position of an imaginary camera used to resolve how to rotate pages in 3D cubic space.

    • Method Detail

      • transformPage

        public void transformPage(View page,
                          float position)
        Specified by:
        transformPage in interface ViewPager.PageTransformer

      • setMinAlpha

        public void setMinAlpha(float alpha)
        Specifies an alpha value used for completely transformed page at the start/end.

        This alpha is also used as base when calculating alpha value for a relative transformed position.

        Parameters:
        alpha - The desired alpha from the range [0.0, 1.0]. Value 0.0 would result in fully transparent page and value 1.0 would result in fully opaque page when completely transformed at the start/end.
        See Also:
        getMinAlpha()

      • getMinAlpha

        public float getMinAlpha()
        Returns the minimum alpha used for completely transformed page.
        Returns:
        Alpha value from the range [0.0, 1.0].
        See Also:
        setMinAlpha(float)
